title: Multiple Data Type Selection Sort
description:
Write a function block FB to implement an ascending order selection sort algorithm. This function block should accept an array of variable length and data types (including Sint, Int, DInt, LInt, Real, LReal, USint, UInt, UDInt, ULint) and write the sorted results back to the original array.
Based on the program execution results, output the corresponding error status and status code:
16#0000: No error occurred when executing FB
16#8A01: The queue seq is not an array type
name: SelectSort

output.name: error
output.description:
FALSE: No error occurred
TRUE: Error occurred while executing FB
